mapper.select: select * from room join roomtype on room.type=roomtype.name where roomtype.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{roomType},'%')
select * from room where room.status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{roomStatus},'%')
select * from room where room.floor LIKE CONCAT('%',#{floor},'%')
select * from checkin join roomregister on checkin.roomRegister=roomregister.id join room on roomregister.room=room.id where room.type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{roomType},'%')
